page.title: 18Fashion in l985.
page.content: People are becoming much more fashion conscious than they used to be The look for this summer is bright, casual and sporty. The traditional rugby shirt has become the basis for many different styles of casual shirts Loose fitting and baggy shorts are another new look for this summer. Todays colours are lemon, turquoise, vivid reds, blues, white and pink. Pop stars and night club goers wear very expensive and fashionable clothes. Gone are traditional stereotypes; women dress up in manish clothes. Many men are now growing their hair and wearing jewellry such as earrings. It may only be a natural progression for men to be wearing skirts. The high street fashion chains are now expanding their stocks for this possibility.
